title: Drawing, "Antique Female Statue", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on cream paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Shown at oblique angel, turned left. Lowered left hand holds corner of dress. Lowered right hand holds paper roll.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Antique Female Statue", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on cream paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2466.
